(Sorry I took so long to post. I'll resume the job of posting damage for the 
CF. I apologize if something is amiss, I had trouble making sense of some of 
the e-mails, they arrived out of order.)

Hysteria/Tavatron

Hysteria:

Hysteria continued to crawl across the roof of the CF. She dragged the large 
case along with her, stopping occasionally to listen to the CF's comp over 
her internal communicator. It was barely audible, but loud enough for her to 
hear:

CF comp: Shields at 55% amd falling.

The great ship shook with each blast from the Brotherhood and Decepticons. 
The hull was already badly damaged, if the shields went there was no doubt 
in the Tech 'bot's mind that the hull would be next.

*****

Tavatron:

Tavatron coughed and batted at the ash that rose up around her. That was the 
last thing they needed right now. She waited patiently, well, as patiently 
as any warrior could, for the dust  to settle enough for her to get a clear 
target. Her head was still pounding and her joints felt weak, but she wasn't 
about to give in to some pathetic faulty programming. Her world had always 
been cloaked in darkness. This was merely one more test, one she would not 
fail.

Tavatron had lost sight of Dinobot sometime ago, but kept his postion 
clearly marked on her sensors. They seemed rather... heightened, moreso than 
usual. Tavatron paid it no heed as she charged her staff and sent two waves 
of energy in a criss cross formation in Vehement's direction. (Like this: +)
